Articles.Content:
Faster Voltage 2.0

Hello welcome to the Future of life itself! now life is going to Have HyperDrives, Atomic Engines, 5 mile Interstellar ships, and More!

This mod will be in development for a bit because we have to create "Hyperspace" and a "Run_Hyperspace_plugin" plugin that runs hyperspace when you activate the hyperdrive. if you want a developer version send a friend request and you will have it!

The plug-in is Almost ready So reply to this thread if You want to get message's when the update is out right now the plug-in add's Mineral's! the plugin has hit a delay...

Edited October 30, 2013 by pat8996
Delayed Plugin
Hey Id love a message when your ready and Id be happy to help bug test as well. Im not much good with coding but if you think I can help leme know.
